trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around August 25th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsNoticed a orb off to the north east orb flashed all different colors. Noticed an object shoot from the trees right to the orb that we saw. We watch the object change color and fade in and out. Checked the next night to make sure it wasnt a star. Sure enough it wasnt there. There have been other spotters of this object and other sightings throughout the summer near the area I live.
